message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $110?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to go up to $115?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out. I'm thinking $112 is a fair price. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, Alice, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $110? I think that's a great price for this product.

I'm not willing to go back to $110, Bob. I think $114 is a more reasonable price considering the value the product brings. I'm willing to meet you close to your target, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. What do you think?
